room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Orlando
review: We did The Bunker Room and had a great time! It was challenging but not impossible. Kids ages 19,17,16&14. Everyone enjoyed! Highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "The President's Bunker" by The Great Escape Room in Orlando
review: We had so much fun visiting this escape room! It's conveniently located downtown between Harp and Celt pub and Magnolia. Mather and Celine are across the street. We did the President's Bunker with was the hardest room, but we made it out in 51 minutes! It was very cool that doing one thing can open a box or a door or a wall, surprisingly very well done. I would come back again to do another room!
